food.question: I am yellow, and monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys enjoy eating me.
💛 I'm a popular fruit with a yellow peel.
🍌 I grow in bunches.

food.question: I am white, fluffy, and good with butter. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I'm made from grains.
🍚 People often eat me with a spoon.
🍚 I am often served as a side dish.

food.question: I am orange, crunchy, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground.
🐰 Rabbits enjoy munching on me.
🥕 I'm a root vegetable.

food.question: I am a drink that comes from a cow. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 A farm animal produces me.
🥛 I'm often poured on cereal.
🍼 Babies drink me.

food.question: I am round, and I come in many colors, like red, green, or yellow. An apple a day keeps the doctor away, or so they say. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on trees.
🍎 I'm a common fruit often found in lunchboxes.
🥧 You can make pies with me.

food.question: I am long and thin, made from flour and water. I'm often served with sauce. What am I?

hints.text: 🍝 I come in different shapes, like spaghetti or macaroni.
🇮🇹 I am a popular food in Italy.
🍅 I often taste delicious with tomato sauce.

food.question: I am a cold treat that comes in many flavors. I'm often eaten in a cone or cup. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I'm perfect on a hot day.
🥄 You usually eat me with a spoon.
🍨 Some people add sprinkles on top of me.

food.question: I am made of bread, cheese, and tomato sauce. You can add pepperoni on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇹 I originated in Italy.
🍕 I am often cut into slices.
🔥 I am usually cooked in an oven.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin and a sweet, juicy inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🇨🇳 I am originally from China.
🥝 I'm often green inside.
🥄 You can scoop out the flesh with a spoon.

food.question: I am a baked treat with a hole in the middle. You can cover me in frosting or glaze. What am I?

hints.text: 🍩 I'm often eaten for breakfast or as a snack.
☕️ I taste great with coffee.
🇺🇸 I am especially popular in America.

cosmos.question: I shine bright in the night sky, but I'm not a star. I travel around a planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I am full, sometimes I am just a sliver.
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.
🌍 I orbit the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of hot gas that gives off light and heat. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
😎 You shouldn't look directly at me without protection.
🌞 The Earth orbits me.

cosmos.question: I am the red planet. People are trying to visit me someday. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 My soil is a reddish color like rust.
🚀 Rovers have explored me.
🪐 I am a planet in our solar system.

cosmos.question: I am the largest planet in our solar system. I have a big red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 My spot is a giant storm!
📏 I am bigger than all the other planets combined.
🪐 I am a gas giant.

cosmos.question: I am a planet known for my beautiful rings. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice, rock, and dust.
🪐 I am a gas giant like Jupiter.
🔭 You can see my rings with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that form a pattern in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa 🐻 Major is an example of me.
✨ People use me to navigate.
🌌 I am made of stars

cosmos.question: I am a space rock that burns up in Earth's atmosphere, creating a streak of light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌠 Sometimes I am called a 'shooting star'.
☄️ I am smaller than a planet.
🔥 I get very hot when entering the atmosphere.

cosmos.question: I am a huge collection of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our solar system is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular.
🌌 The Milky Way is one of me.
🔭 Astronomers study me.

cosmos.question: I am a cloud of gas and dust in space where stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am often very colorful.
🌟 New stars come from me.
🔭 The Eagle and Orion are examples of me.

cosmos.question: I am the farthest planet from the sun. I am a cold, icy giant. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I am very blue
💨 I have strong winds
🪐 I am one of the gas giants
